verbose_text: Multiple mutations of genes, SCN5A, SCN1B, SCN3B, GPD1L, CACNA1C, CACNB2, KCNE3 and KCND3, have been shown to decrease cardiac Na + and Ca 2+ channel activity or increase fast transient outward K + channel activity, and they are linked to BrS.
evidence: SCN1B, SCN3B, GPD1L, CACNA1C, CACNB2, KCNE3 and KCND3, have been shown to decrease cardiac Na
